revisions.*:
'''Fists''' are the weapons in ''[[Dark Souls]]'' available to the player by default should they have no [[Weapons (Dark Souls)|weapons]] equipped. Throughout the entire game, stronger alternatives are available, and fists' only effective use are as humiliation weapons or when the player wants to cut down on [[weight]] while avoiding confrontations.

==Characteristics==

Fists are one of the few examples of a weapon that cannot be two-handed. They cannot be [[Weapon Modification|upgraded]]. Also, regardless of the player's [[Strength (Dark Souls)|Strength]] or [[Dexterity (Dark Souls)|Dexterity]] level, their fists will always have an attack value of 20.

Players that join the [[Path of the Dragon]] [[covenant]] deal substantially more damage with their fists when in dragonoid form, in that their dragon-like fists have an attack rating of 400.
